text: GlomerellaceaeLocq. ex Seifert & W. Gams, in Zhang, Castlebury, Miller, Huhndorf, Schoch, Seifert, Rossman, Rogers, Kohlmeyer, Volkmann-Kohlmeyer Sung (2007) [2006] Mycologia 98(6): 1083. is a family of fungi in the class Sordariomycetes. == Genera == * Blennorella * Colletotrichum (sexual stage is Glomerella) * Ellisiellina * Haplothecium * Peresia * Schizotrichella * Vermicularia ==References== ==External Links== * * Category:Sordariomycetes Category:Fungus families
title: Glomerellaceae
